channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The entire stretch of road is awful, 14th November
item.description:
This has been a terrible road for years. It's absolutely awful, a single pothole would be such an understatement of a description. You literally need to swerve to not destroy your car on this road. There are no road marking either! How in this day and age is this allowed? Where on earth does my tax money go?? That entire stretch of road DEMANDS repaying yet instead, you repave other fine roads and build this ludicrous cycle lane that all of 2 people will use and spend millions on that. Sort your priorities out, it's a disgrace to Cheltenham!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 167, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed breaker or speed limit enforcement, 14th November
item.description:
The junction between Mirabelle Road, Lambourn Road and Bramley close is dangerous specifically after opening road at co-op on Vale road. The road approaching from and to gotherington road on to Mirabelle road at the above 3 road junction are generally too fast and most likely an incident may happen. Also due to heavy residence the junction is too dangerous for vehicles as well as pedestrians. Consideration must be given to have explicit speed limits and speed breakers at the junction. Also priority at the above 3 road junction need to marked to avoid any ambiguity.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Bramley Close, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain sump never been cleaned for many years, 14th November
item.description:
Road drain outside no 9 japonica drive has for many years been covered by shrubbery. So its sump has never been cleaned out for many years by the sludge wagon that comes around on occasion. It collects a lot of mud runoff and debris being at the lowest point of the street so its sump must be overflowing into the drain pipe run by now. The folliage is now cut back now so its visible and easier to access. No blockages yet.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Japonica Drive, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Slippery foot and cycle path, 14th November
item.description:
The foot and cycle paths running through Sandford park are starting to get slippery with the fallen leaves and no wind to blow them away. I cycle this route daily and itâ€™s getting worse. Today I saw an older person slip quite badly and almost fall. Can the leaves be cleared from the part before the weather gets wet and icy please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 14th November
item.description:
There is an electrical box which is broken and open on the corner of Barley Road and Prestbury Road in Cheltenham. Please can someone look at it urgently as it may be dangerous.
Report on FixMyStreet
